Description.Text:
Just a few steps away from Tel Aviv-Jaffa’s famous boardwalk, and the Tel Aviv shore.
The famous Opera Tower is two minutes walking distance from the hotel, and located there is one of the most famous cafés in Tel Aviv.
Also in walking distance is Tel Aviv’s largest mall, Dizengoff Center, and an authentic outdoor market of local merchants. Streets for shopping and the great tourist sites of the White City are only a short distance from Hayarkon St. At a distance of 20 minute walk you can find the Tel Aviv Marina with its amazing views and attractions, as well as the Hatachana entertainment complex, and the Neve Tzedek artist colony.
Near the hotel you can find restaurants, clubs, bars, parks, cinemas, running and bike paths, water sports, car rental agencies, and more. The Blue Sea Marble staff will be happy to answer any question you may have, or to recommend the best sites and help you get oriented both in Tel Aviv, and Israel general. We will do all that we can to ensure that you have a pleasant stay and an unforgettable Tel Aviv experience!
Continental breakfast serve in the morning. All day coffee/tea available
This accommodation has a very small lobby.
